description: Those who unleash their inner fury to become living engines of destruction. Warriors of instinct and endurance who trade control for devastating strength.

talents.name: Rage
talents.description: Your fury becomes a weapon, an instinctive state that channels pure energy into every strike.

ranks.1: As a Bonus Action, enter into rage for 1 minute. While raging, you gain advantage on Might checks and saving throws, deal +2 damage to melee attacks, and gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
ranks.3: +1 to melee attack rolls while raging. You can rage one additional time per long rest.
ranks.4: Rage damage bonus increases to +4. Gain +10 ft movement while raging.
ranks.5: While raging, you cannot be charmed or frightened.
ranks.6: Rage damage bonus increases to +5. Gain +1 to all saving throws while raging.
ranks.7: You can rage one additional time per long rest (total 3). Rage lasts 2 minutes.
ranks.8: Rage damage bonus increases to +6. Attacks against you while raging have -1 penalty.
ranks.9: While raging, your critical hits deal triple damage dice instead of double.
ranks.10: Eternal Rage: Your rage no longer has a time limit. While raging, you are immune to exhaustion and gain regeneration (regain 5 HP at the start of each of your turns if you have at least 1 HP).

talents.name: Brutal Strike
talents.description: Your attacks land with bone-shattering impact, breaking both body and morale.

ranks.1: When you score a critical hit, roll one additional damage die.
ranks.2: Your critical hits are on 19-20. On a critical hit, knock the target prone or push them 10 ft (no save).
ranks.3: Once per turn, if you reduce a target to 0 HP, make a free melee attack against another creature within reach.

talents.name: Detect Danger
talents.description: Instinct keeps you alive, you sense danger before others perceive it.

ranks.1: You cannot be surprised while conscious.
ranks.2: Gain advantage on Initiative and +2 Passive Perception.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, enter Predator's Focus for 1 minute, granting advantage on d20 rolls during the first round of combat.

talents.name: Primal Armor
talents.description: Your body hardens under duress, adapting to absorb punishment.

ranks.1: While not wearing armor, your Armor Hit Points equal your Endurance score. These points are restored after a short rest and can be healed.
ranks.2: Gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Attacks against you have -1 penalty while you have Primal Armor points remaining.
ranks.3: Primal Armor points equal Endurance score + level. Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 Primal Armor, immediately regain half your maximum.

talents.name: Primal Instinct
talents.description: The deeper your fury runs, the more your body moves without thought or hesitation.

ranks.1: When damage drops you below half HP, gain +10 ft movement and +1 to melee attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
ranks.2: Gain advantage against fear and charm effects.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, when you take damage, immediately move up to half your speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

talents.name: Reckless Tactics
talents.description: You abandon defense for overwhelming offense, pressing every opening.

ranks.1: When you attack, you may choose to attack recklessly, gaining advantage on all melee attacks until your next turn. Attacks against you also gain advantage during this time.
ranks.2: Gain +1 damage die on critical hits while attacking recklessly.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, when attacking recklessly, your attacks deal +2d6 damage for the round.

talents.name: Savage Momentum
talents.description: Each strike fuels your next, driving you into a devastating rhythm of continuous power.

ranks.1: When you hit a creature with a melee attack, gain +1 damage on your next melee attack made before the end of your next turn.
ranks.2: When you reduce a creature to 0 LP, immediately move up to half your movement without provoking opportunity attacks.
ranks.3: Damage bonus stacks up to +3. When you score a critical hit, gain a free attack against another creature within reach.

talents.name: Master of Power
talents.description: You are the embodiment of raw force, a storm of muscle, instinct, and unbreakable will.

ranks.1: Your Rage becomes permanent and cannot be suppressed by external means. When an attack or effect would reduce you to 0 LP or fewer, remain at 1 LP until the end of your next turn (you have disadvantage on attacks, saves, and checks before collapsing, receiving â€“2 Life Points). You are immune to the Frightened and Charmed conditions. Once per long rest, when you reduce a creature to 0 LP, regain all Primal Armor Points. When you roll a natural 20 on an attack, your strike deals triple dice damage instead of double.
